questions.quote: I'll tell you what's up. My stepmother is violently ill, so I hit the button for poison control and I get you!
Oh you may stray, but you'll always return to your dark master, the cocoa bean.
It's probably so the woman has one last chance to change her mind.
You know, if you were blind, what do you think the worst part of it would be?
I think I'd really like to be a city planner.  Why limit myself to just one building, when I can design a whole city?
Never mind, never mind. I need you to do me a favour. Uhm, remember what we were talking about at the coffee shop earlier?
...shell. And fondled his muscled heart. He embibed her glistening spell...just before the other shoe...fell.
What about the woman who's been drugged and taken advantage of?
Because she's not returning it until she gets the money back for the hospital bill.
Well we're sitting here together. Why wouldn't you think that.
